duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct ongoing social assessment of clients and develop overall case plans.
Counsel clients concerning the identification and achievement of personal goals.
Develop client goals and service plans according to case plan.
Intervene with clients using various approaches as per the case plan.
Encourage clients and families to fully participate in utilizing social service resources available.
Perform tasks related to fiscal accountability.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in social work, rehabilitation counseling or a related field from an accredited college or a Bachelor's Degree in Social Work plus four years of experience.
